definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: The woman's beauty made her a rare bird indeed.
sentences.chinese: 美貌確實使她成了一個絕世佳人。

sentences.english: Yueqin island supernatural beauty daidouji naokou is incredibly "queen"?
sentences.chinese: 月琴島上的絕世美人大路寺智子竟然是“蜂王”？

sentences.english: Eg. She is gorgeous, a total knock-out with a killer body and she's just my dream girl.
sentences.chinese: 她是絕世的美女，身材惹火，簡直就是我的夢中情人。

sentences.english: Upgrading of weapon make new-hand weapon has chances to become supernatural soldiers absolutely.
sentences.chinese: 武器升級，讓新手武器也有機會成爲絕世神兵。

sentences.english: Chinese food is as rich and varied as any on earth.
sentences.chinese: 中國食物豐富和多樣性絕世無雙。
絕世好工作，七月啓航帆。

sentences.english: Sandstone is the key to Nottingham's unique subterranean heritage, he said.
sentences.chinese: 砂岩是諾丁漢地下絕世文物瑰寶存在的關鍵之處。

sentences.english: Today is the first day Zhou Benchi begins to learn the magic"Wulitou English".
sentences.chinese: 周奔馳在初學《無厘頭英語》絕世武功祕籍第一天。

sentences.english: She is gorgeous, a total knock-out , with a killer body; she's just my dream girl.
sentences.chinese: 她是絕世的美女，身材惹火，簡直就是我的夢中情人。

sentences.english: A pretty woman, he does not make.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯他沒能打造出一位絕世美女。

sentences.english: Cavers in Mexico confront extreme conditions and find extraordinary beauty.
sentences.chinese: 身處墨西哥的探洞者遭遇極端的環境並發現絕世美景。

definition: to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
to have a clear conscience/to feel no qualms
great scholar respected for learning and integrity
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
